name: Botany Break
description:
Botany Break is a short 3D puzzle  in which you play as a Botanist trying to escape her space station in wake of a lockdown.

This is a game with a relaxing puzzle experience that is supposed to make you feel good.

I'm a Game Design student and I made this as a 3rd semester project for my school.
We were supposed to build a short 3D platformer game after specific requirements. I've had a lot of fun making this and learned a lot, especially about level design and 3D modelling. I hope you'll have fun trying my little game out!

Controls

Sprint - Left Shift
Walk - WASD
Interact - E
Go Back - Backspace
Enter Code - Enter/Space
